original_title: Gram Parsons All-Star Tribute: Sessions at West 54th
overview: A tribute to Gram Parsons, a pioneering artist in alternative country music, features performances by host John Hiatt, Sheryl Crow, the Mavericks, Emmylou Harris, Whiskeytown, Gillian Welch, Steve Earle, Chris Hillman and Margot Timmons.
title: Gram Parsons All-Star Tribute: Sessions at West 54th
